names.hanzi: decoction to drive out blood stasis and create new blood
names.commonEnglish: Decoction to Drive out Blood Stasis and Create New Blood

actions: Drains Heat, purges accumulations, invigorates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
With Rou Gui, for chronic constipation.
With Dang Gui Wei, for Blood Stasis.
Invigorates and harmonizes the Blood and disperses Cold.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
With Da Huang, clears Deficiency Fire.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis.
Purges accumulations, guides out Stagnation, softens hardness and moistens Dryness.
With Da Huang, for constipation due to Heat in the Stomach and Intestines.
Disperses deep Cold, warms and unblocks the channels and vessels, alleviates pain and assists in the generation of Qi and Blood.
With Da Huang, invigorates the Blood.

symptoms: Heaviness or tightness in the chest
Pain that is fixed, stabbing and /or severe
Blue, dark or purplish discoloration of skin in small or large areas
Tendency to hemorrhage dark blood or clots
manifestations.tongue: Purple, possible purple or red spots Red purple if there is Heat Blue purple if there is Cold
